headline: Assessing Kinder Morgan After 31% Stock Jump and Recent Gulf Coast LNG Expansion
summary: Thinking about what to do with Kinder Morgan stock right now? You are not alone. Whether you have been holding KMI for years, are sizing up your first buy, or simply wondering if the recent run-up has more room to go, there is plenty to unpack. Over the last twelve months, Kinder Morgan has returned over 31% on a total return basis, easily outpacing the broader energy sector and turning heads across the investment landscape. Some of that excitement is the result of strategic moves in the...
